'''Mysterious Shadow''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in [[Sacrificial Offering]]. During the quest, she can be found at the abandoned shrine northwest of [[Konda Village]], where the player must talk to her three clones until she teleports to the three [[Sky Kitsune Statue]]s on the platform to proceed with the quest.
